title: Son recounts mom's concerns night before building collapse
description: Pablo Rodriguez, whose mother and grandmother are still unaccounted for following the collapse of his mom's condo building in Surfside, Florida, tells CNN's Erin Burnett about the most recent conversation he had with his mom.

title: Good luck breaking this deceptively tough world record
description: How many M&M's can you stack? A British civil engineer Will Cutbill breaks the Guinness M&M-stacking record. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports it's harder than it looks.

title: Video from 2020 shows 'Trump Train' swarm the Biden-Harris campaign bus
description: New video from inside a Biden-Harris campaign bus shows the 2020 incident where Trump supporters surrounded the bus, and allegedly collided with one staffer's car.

title: European tourism plummets as delta variant threat continues
description: European Tourism Association CEO Tom Jenkins discusses how European travel has fallen due to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic and the delta variant threat.

title: See Tom Brady nail 'Hamilton' rap with late-night host
description: Tom Brady joined "The Late Late Show" host James Corden for a round of golf and an impressive rendition of a rap from the hit musical "Hamilton."

title: Russia releases footage showing warship at center of UK dispute
description: A UK government minister said Britain was prepared to sail naval vessels through disputed waters near Crimea again, a day after a confrontation between a British warship and Russian forces in the Black Sea. CNN's Nic Robertson and Matthew Chance report.

title: 'Polar dinosaurs' may have given birth in the Arctic over 70 million years ago, study finds
description: Dinosaurs may have given birth and lived year-round in the Artic, a new study revealed.

title: Cuban migrants are attempting treacherous journey to US
description: CNN's Patrick Oppmann gains exclusive access to the port where those trying to flee Cuba are returned by the US Coast Guard. Cuba is seeing record daily cases of Covid-19 while Trump-era sanctions, Covid restrictions and the collapse of tourism have hit the island's economy and peoples' incomes hard.

title: Condemnation builds over deadly government airstrike in Tigray
description: International condemnation is growing over an airstrike that killed dozens of people in Ethiopia's war-torn northern Tigray region earlier this week, as Africa's second-most populous nation tallied ballots to decide its next leader.

title: See the 'strawberry' moon, the last supermoon of 2021
description: The last supermoon of 2021 -- the "strawberry" full moon -- will rise Thursday.

title: Denmark provides feel good story of Euro 2020 with unlikely qualification for knockout stages
description: In the space of just nine days, Copenhagen's Parken Stadium played host to Euro 2020's worst moment and then its best.

title: UK says it would sail into Crimean waters again, a day after confrontation with Russia
description: A UK government minister said Thursday that Britain was prepared to sail naval vessels through disputed waters near Crimea again, a day after confrontation between a British warship and Russian forces in the Black Sea.

title: A multi-story building near Miami has partially collapsed, authorities say
description: Authorities in Miami Beach, Florida, responded to a "partial building collapse" early Thursday morning, Miami-Dade Fire Rescue said.

title: Eyewitness near building collapse: It looked like something from 9/11
description: Authorities in South Florida were responding early Thursday to a "partial building collapse," the Miami-Dade Fire Rescue said. Michael Ruiz, a resident spoke to CNN affiliate WPLG.

title: 'Hotels on rails': Plans for new network of European sleeper trains unveiled
description: Just a few years ago, it looked as though European sleeper trains were on their way to becoming a thing of the past as services were continually cut back.

title: Referee controversy overshadows Brazil's Copa América win over Colombia
description: Brazil maintained its perfect record at the 2021 Copa América with a 2-1 win over Colombia, but it was a result that was marred by controversy.

title: Former Philippine President Benigno Aquino dies age 61
description: The former President of the Philippines Benigno Aquino III died Thursday at the age of 61 after being hospitalized in Quezon City, state media reported.

title: Britney Spears: 'I just want my life back'
description: Britney Spears broke her silence in a court hearing on Wednesday regarding her court-ordered conservatorship that has been in place for nearly 13 years.

title: John McAfee found dead in Spanish prison after his extradition to the US was approved
description: John McAfee, the controversial antivirus software magnate who'd had multiple recent run-ins with the US law, has died at 75. McAfee was awaiting extradition in a Spanish prison after being charged with tax evasion in the United States last year.

title: Afghanistan is disintegrating fast as Biden's troop withdrawal continues
description: Earlier this week, a lone Taliban gunman with a red skull cap and a rifle sauntered up to the gates of Mazar-i-Sharif, Afghanistan's fourth largest city, and snapped a selfie.

title: This 'nano factory' fits inside a shipping container
description: When you think of a factory, you might imagine a giant facility with huge chimneys belching steam. But consumer goods giant Unilever has developed a fully functioning production line inside a shipping container.

title: Covid canceled weddings around the world. It also influenced dress codes
description: The havoc wreaked by Covid-19 on the wedding industry was bound to leave its mark somehow. With 2020 ceremonies across the globe postponed indefinitely or canceled altogether, determined couples adapted as best they could: slashing guest lists by more than two-thirds and matching their outfits to mandatory face coverings. Some weddings even went virtual, with attendees dialing in to meeting apps to watch vows broadcast online.

title: Taiwan's foreign minister: This is not just Taiwan's problem
description: In an exclusive interview with CNN's Will Ripley, Taiwan's Foreign Minister Joseph Wu discussed the island's relations with China, including Beijing's military threat and the risk of cyberattacks.

title: Blink-182 singer and bassist Mark Hoppus reveals he's undergoing cancer treatment
description: Blink-182 singer and bassist Mark Hoppus is undergoing chemotherapy for cancer, he said Wednesday on his social media accounts.

title: Giant panda gives birth to twin cubs at Tokyo's Ueno Zoo
description: A month ahead of the Tokyo Summer Olympic Games, the city has another reason to celebrate -- giant panda Shin Shin has given birth to twin cubs at Ueno Zoo, the first panda birth there in four years.

title: Watch Apple Daily print last edition before shutdown
description: Hong Kong's biggest pro-democracy newspaper, Apple Daily, will close its print and digital production as Beijing tightens its grip.

title: Taiwan's foreign minister says 'we need to prepare' for military conflict with China
description: China's escalating military intimidation of Taiwan shows the self-governed island "needs to prepare" for a possible military conflict, Taiwan's Foreign Minister Joseph Wu said in an exclusive interview with CNN.

title: Rembrandt's 'Night Watch' on display with missing figures restored by AI
description: For the first time in 300 years, Rembrandt's famed "The Night Watch" is back on display in what researchers say is its original size, with missing parts temporarily restored in an exhibition aided by artificial intelligence.

title: Justin Timberlake: 'After what we saw today, we should all be supporting Britney at this time'
description: Britney Spears once declared Justin Timberlake her great love and on Wednesday he showed her love after she spoke out during her conservatorship hearing.

title: Man carrying homemade bombs shot dead by Chinese police following 16-hour standoff
description: A suspected thief was shot dead by police at his home in southwestern China on Wednesday after he repeatedly threatened to detonate explosives during a 16-hour standoff.

title: Hundreds of unmarked graves discovered at a former residential school in Canada, officials say
description: Hundreds of unmarked graves were discovered at the site of the former Marieval Indian Residential School in Canada, the Federation of Sovereign Indigenous Nations said Wednesday.

title: Tasmanian devils were moved to an island for their protection. Now there's no more penguins
description: Efforts to save Australia's endangered Tasmanian devil population led to thousands of sea birds being wiped out on an island in the Tasman Sea, according to local environmentalists.

title: Japan's top court rules couples must use the same surname
description: Japan's top court on Wednesday threw out a challenge by three couples who wanted to keep their own surnames after marriage, ruling that laws stipulating Japanese couples must choose one family name were constitutional, according to local media.

title: Brazilian Environment Minister Ricardo Salles resigns amid Amazon illegal logging probe
description: Brazil's controversial environment minister, Ricardo Salles, announced Wednesday that he was stepping down from the position amid an investigation into allegations he obstructed a police probe into illegal logging.

title: Why the infrastructure deal is so important for Joe Biden
description: President Joe Biden will validate a foundational pillar of his presidency on Thursday -- a quest to court Republicans across Congress' poisoned divides -- if he signs off on a hard won bipartisan infrastructure deal.

title: Silicon Valley gave Asia's richest man billions, but things aren't all going to plan
description: Last year, Google and Facebook collectively bet more than $10 billion on Asia's richest man and his plan to bring hundreds of millions of Indians online.

title: His wife died by suicide after a 13-month battle with long-haul Covid. He hopes help is on the way for others
description: Filmmaker Nick Guthe says in the months before his wife, Heidi Ferrer, died by suicide, she suffered debilitating long-haul Covid symptoms.

title: Buckingham Palace admits it 'must do more' on diversity in annual report
description: Buckingham Palace has admitted the royal household is not diverse enough, as it releases its annual financial report.

title: Chinese private security presence is growing in Southeast Asia, report finds
description: Chinese businesses with risky investments in Southeast Asia's Mekong region are increasingly turning to legal, China-based private security companies for protection, according to a new report.

title: Pope Francis shakes hands with Spider-Man
description: How did Spider-Man get to meet the Pope and hand him a mask? CNN's Jeanne Moos untangles the web behind the photo that's become a web sensation.
